exceptions.exn: In environment A, B : lattice s : Pred (A * B) p : A * B H : p \\In s Unable to unify "(sup [Pred p | exists f : A * B, p = f.1 /\\ f \\In s], sup [Pred p | exists f : A * B, p = f.2 /\\ f \\In s]).1" with "p.1".

In environment A, B : lattice s : Pred (A * B) p : A * B H : p \\In s Unable to unify "p \\In s" with "p.1 <== (sup [Pred p | exists f : A * B, p = f.1 /\\ f \\In s], sup [Pred p | exists f : A * B, p = f.2 /\\ f \\In s]).1".

In environment A, B : lattice s : Pred (A * B) p : A * B H : p \\In s Unable to unify "(sup [Pred p | exists f : A * B, p = f.1 /\\ f \\In s], sup [Pred p | exists f : A * B, p = f.2 /\\ f \\In s]).1" with "p.1".

In environment A, B : lattice s : Pred (A * B) p : A * B H : p \\In s Unable to unify "p \\In s" with "p.1 <== (sup [Pred p | exists f : A * B, p = f.1 /\\ f \\In s], sup [Pred p | exists f : A * B, p = f.2 /\\ f \\In s]).1".

original: simpl. intros. unfold pair_sup. split; intros H. - constructor. exists p. split. reflexivity. apply H. - constructor. exists p. split. reflexivity. apply H.
